data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Catanduanes, Philippines a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Catanduanes, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Catanduanes who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Catanduanes access to a Bible in their own language.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Catanduanes, Philippines, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Manobo, Umayamnon people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Catanduanes with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Catanduanes, Philippines that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Catanduanes, Philippines has a population of 61,100.

We estimate Catanduanes has 8,511 people who might know Jesus, 47,069 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,520 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Catanduanes that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.
